title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message: Boards turns on, charges, and recognizes the battery but wont run off the battery. Tried another dc in board and checked R6906, its good. Went to check R6905 next but appears to be no stuff on this board. Compared to known good board and also appears to be no stuff. What to check next?

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message:
You've got confused somehow.
The board cannot work on charger alone without R6905.
But should work with charged battery in such case.
If board works on charger alone, but doesn't work on battery only, check R6906.
If is good, post all U6990 voltages.

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message:
U6990

 pin 1 1.258V

 pin 2 3.4V 

pin 3 7.14v  

pin 4 3.4V 

pin 6 18v

 pin 8 18v

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message: Which case did you take these readings???

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message: What do you mean? Just measured again and those readings are correct on the meter?

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message:
Measurements done with charger alone, battery alone, or both connected?
Board is turned on also?

title: 820-3209 wont run off battery
message: They were done with charger alone. Problem solved. Q6910 was faulty
